SuccessEvent.Description: You bewilder them in a drift of fog, and you're off into the zee...
SuccessEvent.Name: Not so very quick

DefaultEvent.Description: Their captain's as wily as you. Too close, too late. Begin.
DefaultEvent.Name: Quick enough

ChildBranches.Name: Flee!
ChildBranches.Description: You might yet escape. How quick are they?

Description: Corsairs in outdated cockade hats cram the decks of the ship, yelling threats and insults.
Name: Pirate Frigate
